alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 7:49PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Broward and southern Palm Beach Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 748 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Belle Glade Camp to 10 miles south of Holey Land Wildlife Refuge. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Belle Glade, South Bay, Royal Palm Beach, Okeelanta, Loxahatchee NWR, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Belle Glade Camp, Miccosukee Service Plaza, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Loxahatchee Groves, Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Lion Country Safari Park and The Acreage. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southern and southeastern Florida.
